topicSummary: Insomnia is difficulty in getting to sleep, difficulty staying asleep, early wakening, or non-restorative sleep

topicHtmlObjects.htmlHeader: Insomnia: Summary

latestChanges.title: Minor update
latestChanges.body: Update to the text to reflect a new law on drugs and impaired driving Department for Transport, 2014.

latestChanges.title: Minor update
latestChanges.body: Update to the text to reflect recent MHRA advice regarding zolpidem and next day drowsiness, which may affect driving ability MHRA, 2014.

latestChanges.title: Reviewed
latestChanges.body: Literature searches were conducted in January 2014 to identify evidence-based guidelines, UK policy, systematic reviews, and key RCTs published since the last revision of this topic. No significant changes have been made to the recommendations in this topic. A prescribing information section has been added.
